journal.title: Task Completed: docs/workflows.md
journal.author: claude-code
journal.content: Created docs/workflows.md (703 lines) by extracting and vastly expanding Common Workflows section from README. Comprehensive step-by-step guides for 7 major workflows: Plan and Implement a Feature (full lifecycle from spec creation to completion), Resume After Break (handling multiple active specs), Generate and Query Documentation (including scoped context with --plan/--implement), Multi-Model Spec Review (parallel AI consultation), Verify Implementation Fidelity (compliance checking), Debug Test Failures (AI-powered debugging), and Create Pull Request (AI-generated PR descriptions). journal.title: Task Completed: docs/cli-reference.md
journal.author: claude-code
journal.content: Created docs/cli-reference.md (875 lines) by extracting and comprehensively expanding CLI reference from README. Complete command-line documentation organized by category: Spec Operations (create, activate-spec, next-task, prepare-task, update-status, complete-task, validate, list-specs, progress with all options and examples), Documentation Commands (doc generate, analyze-with-ai, stats, search, complexity, callers, callees, call-graph, scope with --plan/--implement, impact), Testing Commands (test run, debug, check-tools), Review Commands (plan-review, fidelity-review, render). Each command includes syntax, arguments, options, examples with realistic output, and notes. Added Global Options (output control, verbosity, help), Output Formats comparison (JSON/Rich/Plain with examples), and CLI Usage Tips (7 practical tips including jq piping, aliases, scripting patterns). File emphasizes that regular users should use skills/natural language with Claude Code. Properly cross-references other docs.

journal.title: Task Completed: docs/troubleshooting.md

journal.content: Created docs/troubleshooting.md (625 lines) by extracting and comprehensively expanding troubleshooting content from README. Complete troubleshooting guide organized by category: Installation Issues (skills not working, CLI not found, Python version, plugin updates), Setup and Configuration (sdd-setup problems, permissions, invalid JSON), Skill Execution Issues (timeouts, no active work, blocked tasks), CLI Command Issues (unrecognized commands, output format), Validation Errors (circular dependencies, invalid references, schema failures), AI Tool Failures (provider availability, rate limiting, multi-model failures), Git Integration Issues (git config, gh auth, auto-commit), Documentation Generation Issues (missing docs, language support, size issues), Performance Issues (slow operations, context limits, memory usage). Each section includes Symptoms, Diagnosis commands, and detailed Solutions with code examples. Added Getting More Help section with log locations, debug mode, issue reporting guidelines, and community resources. Quick Reference section for common commands. Properly cross-references other docs.
